title: Manufacturers' Sales of Electric Household Refrigerators for United States
notes:
Estimates Are Of World Sales Of Electric Household Refrigerators (Complete Units With Or Without Cabinets) Manufactured In The U.S. Data Sheets Have Been Reconstructed By Multiplying Ratios By 12 Month Moving Averages. Annual Averages Have Been Checked With July Moving Averages. Source: National Electrical Manufacturers' Association, Air Conditioning And Refrigerator News, May 17, 1929, P.11 And February 21, 1940, P.8.

This NBER data series m06042 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06042
